review:
I DO NOT recommend this doc. * ****** ******* ****** *** *** ** * ****** ******* ********** Took my father for leg pain related to diabetes and stroke and when asked how to reverse diabetes or manage it in the best way, he was extremely discouraging and negative and said diabetes can no way be reversed inspite of my father saying he has immense willpower and is willing to do anything to improve his quality of life. The doctor said he is just being honest and ****** ** **** *** ********* **** need which was to get guidance for a healthy life that is beyond just medicines. 

Patients often need encouragement and advise on their lifestyles and are willing to listen only to professionals like doctors instead of their own family. ******* **** *** ******* **** **** ***** *********** ********* *** *** ********* ** ** ****** ** ********** *** ***** ******* I hope they realize they are dealing with a more educated generation now and we expect deep care and quality in their services.

I had a bad experience and i do not recommend him to anyone. He is not even ready to listen what the patient wants to speak, just suggesting end test *** ***** *****.
Instead of calming the patients he was shouting. ***** ************** *** rude behaviour.

Very un-friendly. ** *** ****** * ************ ** *** ******** **** **** **** 
Showed no openness or patience to listen to the health issue. He was suggesting symptoms that do not match the issue. The associate doctor in the room was better at grasping what was said. 
Will need to get a second opinion if you're going to him. 
Visited at Apollo hospitals, Bannerghatta.
